settings.title: Custom Beauty For Every You
settings.content:
From one-size-fits-all to one-size-fits-me! Because everyone's skin is different, at Skin Inc we celebrate the uniqueness that makes you, you.

Bespoke, fuss-free skincare is at the heart of Skin Inc’s DNA.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Be the first to find out about all the good stuff Skin Inc has to offer. Subscribe now and get 10% off your first purchase.

settings.title: Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.subtitle: winner of more than 150 beauty awards
settings.content: Our products are rock stars. It's no wonder Skin Inc has won over 150 beauty awards and is featured in publications like VOGUE, WWD, Refinery29, and more.

settings.title: customize, don’t compromise
settings.content: Stop the guesswork from your skincare routine! Decode your unique skin concerns with the Skin Identity Check and customize your personal skincare solution for superior results. There's a custom beauty for every you, starting with My Daily Dose® Serums, to the award-winning Optimizer Voyage Tri-Light devices, and our latest #Skinnovation, the world’s first custom sleeping mask My Nightly Dose®.

settings.title: less is more
settings.content: You don't need 20 steps or 20,000 ingredients for beautiful skin. Our scientists have selected ingredients in optimal concentrations as the building blocks for our custom-blended My Daily Dose® and My Nightly Dose™ serums. Turning on the power of customization, our Optimizer Voyage Tri-Light ++ is a multi-tasking 5-in-1 LED device that boosts the performance.

settings.title: CLINICALLY-PROVEN
settings.content: Our Japanese proprietary encapsulation technology in our formula protects active ingredients from exposure to light and oxidation, ensuring supreme freshness and maximum absorption into your skin for optimal results.

settings.title: Supercharge your skincare with light
settings.content: Pair your custom serum with our Optimizer Voyage Tri-Light devices and use LED chromotherapy and low-frequency ultrasound stimulation to enhance results, increasing the efficiency and performance of your skincare.

settings.subtitle: winner of more than 150 beauty awards
settings.content: Our products are rock stars. It's no wonder Skin Inc has won over 150 beauty awards and is featured in publications like VOGUE, WWD, Refinery29, and more.

settings.title: custom beauty for every you
settings.content:
From one-size-fits-all to one-size-fits-me! Because everyone's skin is different, at Skin Inc we celebrate the uniqueness that makes you, you. Bespoke, fuss-free skincare is at the heart of Skin Inc’s DNA.

With the broadest range of customizable skincare products to date, we make it easy for you to give your skin exactly what it needs, when it needs it.

settings.title: Skin and Technology = SkinTech
settings.content:
Skin Inc fuses the latest technology, decades of skin-aging research and your current environmental and lifestyle factors to determine what your skin truly needs.

Up to 80% of your skin condition is affected by lifestyle and environmental factors. 'My Skin Identity’ – Skin Inc’s proprietary self-diagnostic tool developed by Skin Inc scientists based on decades of skin aging research evaluates your skin through a quick and intuitive quiz. Our nifty algorithm recommends a customized serum cocktail known as ‘My Daily Dose’ (MDD) – a bespoke custom-blended serum that delivers your skin goals in one bottle.

settings.title: PROPRIETARY TECHNOLOGY FROM JAPAN
settings.content:
All of our signature serums boast our proprietary encapsulation technology from Japan. These caviar-inspired capsules protect pure ingredients from exposure to light and oxidation, keeping them fresh and potent till the moment they kiss your skin for maximum results.

0% paraben, 0% scent, and 0 ingredients that your skin doesn’t need. That’s what makes our serums suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

Our custom serum doses are versatile and compatible with any skincare and makeup product. The possibilities are endless!

settings.title: a brand loved by millions across the globe
settings.content: Skin Inc is present in over 78 cities in Asia, Europe and the United States. With more than 200 retail distribution points across our Skin Inc concept stores, Sephora and Nordstrom outlets and our selected online partners, fuss-free customizable skin care is always within your reach.

settings.heading: page not found
settings.subheading: We're sorry, but the page you requested could not be found.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Are Skin Inc products safe for use during pregnancy?
settings.answer: All of our products are safe for use during pregnancy with the exception of our Optimizer Voyage devices because of the low frequency technology. You may wish to consult your gynae for advice as well. However, it is a great device which you can use post pregnancy to achieve the coveted healthy and glowing skin.

settings.title: Are Skin Inc products vegan and Halal?
settings.answer: All of our products are vegan with the exception of French Pine Bark and Collagen Serums which contain fish extracts, Pure Recovery Dew, and Pure Nano Hydrating Gel which both contain pearl extracts. Our products have no pork and lard derived ingredients but are not certified halal.

settings.title: Are all Skin Inc products gluten-free?
Does Skin Inc test products on animals?
settings.answer: No, we do not conduct any animal testing

settings.title: How do I know which serums are the best for me?
settings.answer: Taking into account on your skin concerns, background, and lifestyle, our Skin ID Check uses proprietary technology to suggest the best serums to meet your needs. You can take our Skin ID Check by clicking the Create Your Serum tab at the top of the page.

settings.title: What are the colored beads in Skin Inc Serums?
settings.answer: The colored "beads" that you see in our serums are encapsulations of the active ingredients. The encapsulation is made up of natural seaweed that envelops and protects the active ingredients, keeping them pure, fresh and free from oxidation. Upon application, the encapsulation breaks and releases the active ingredients into your skin.

settings.title: Can I mix more than 3 serums in a bottle?
settings.answer: Yes you can. Skin Inc serums are encapsulated and that is the reason why we are able to mix and match. The encapsulation keeps the active ingredients fresh, separate, and prevents oxidation. However, 3 serums is an optimal number to start off and we do recommend layering on additonal serums such as Vitamin A Serum around the eye area to reduce dark circles.

settings.title: What is the power of the low frequency and the wavelengths of the LED lights for the Optimizer Voyage Tri-Light device?
settings.answer: The device uses 3MHZ low frequency stimulation that help to gently regenerate skin cells to increase their metabolism and encourage blood and lymphatic circulation. It also helps enhance penetration of topical application of products and active ingredients to up to 90%.  The device also uses LED chromotherapy that activates light receptors in skin cells and stimulates them to improve skin quality. The wavelengths for our Red light is 625nm, Yellow light is 590mm and Blue light 460nm.

settings.title: What kind of batteries should be used with the Optimizer Voyage devices?
settings.answer: The Optimizer Voyage devices require the use of 3 AAA batteries. Please use ordinary alkaline batteries with no claims of extra strength. Avoid using Energizer batteries.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer: We always aim for make sure our customers love our products, but if you do need to return an order, we’re happy to help. Just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process.

settings.title: More questions?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.banner1_desc: Detox, smooth, lift and enhance your way to your best body with 6 synergistic benefits including advanced Micro-Vibration, Micro-Current, Heating and 3 NASA-inspired LED lights.
settings.banner3_title:
Smooth, Lift, Detox & Glow
Your Way To Healthy Skin
settings.banner3_desc: Customize your treatment to allow for targeted body concerns to be addressed in the safest and most comfortable manner, while still generating the quickest results in the comfort of your own home.
settings.banner4_desc:
Like a palm-sized personal trainer, this device will help tone and contour the neck and chin. Loose skin, lines and wrinkles, will be thing of the past.
Lift Mode stimulates lymphatic drainage, tightens sagging skin, improves, the appearance of fine line and wrinkles.
settings.banner5_desc:
Treat yourself to a full workout, without all the work, effort or time, with the synergistic effects of Micro-Current, Micro-Vibration & Green LED Light Therapy.
Glow Mode helps with lymphatic circulation and detoxification, whilst targeting tonality concerns such post-pregnancy stretch marks, dullness and pigmentation.
settings.banner6_desc:
To help you banish backne, soothe inflammation, drain, toxins, repair skin, tone and sculpt contours switch to Smooth Mode.
Smooth Mode tackles bacteria, soothes skin and improves elasticity with Red and Blue LED lights. Micro-current stimulates collagen, and micro-vibrations promote blood circulation.
settings.banner7_desc:
Emblematic of our Japanese roots and paying homage to ganbanyoku (bedrock bathing) to simulate a hot-stone massage, warming up your muscles.
Heat Mode introduces a warm touch within your body care routine, boosting your overall well-being and relaxing your body for better sleep.
settings.banner8_title: Treat Yourself To A Full Body Workout
settings.banner8_desc: .... Without all the work, effort or time, with the synergistic effects of Micro-Current, Micro-Vibration & LED Light Therapy.
settings.banner8_item1_detail: Lift Mode for tightening sagging skin like the tummy area, arms & thigh by helping to simulate lymphatic circulation.
settings.banner8_item2_detail:
Smooth Mode for dimpled skin & assne.

Lift Mode to help tighten for firmer skin.

Glow Mode for stretch marks.
settings.banner8_item3_detail:
Smooth Mode for dimpled skin & assne.

Lift Mode to help tighten for firmer skin.

Glow Mode for stretch marks.
settings.banner9_title: Similar to warming up your body before a workout, your skin needs to warm up too!
settings.banner9_desc: Soothe and relax tense muscles by giving them a warm massage before starting any treatments. The heat of 42°C / 108°F can help to facilitate your body metabolism, preparing it for your at home spa treatment.
settings.banner10_title: 'Waking Up Your Skin' With A Glide
settings.banner10_desc: Studies have shown that microcurrent can help to 'work out' the muscles, tighten skin and stimulate blood and lymphatic circulation to provide oxygen to the cells and eliminate toxins.
settings.banner10_item1_detail:
Galvanic

Increase skincare absorption rate with consistent wave pattern
settings.banner10_item2_detail:
Rectangular

Smooth skin with longer alternating wave pattern
settings.banner11_title: Smart Micro-Vibrations For A Lifting Effect
settings.banner11_desc: Address the appearance of sagging skin, lines, skin dimpling and areas like saddlebags, love handles and belly bulge by helping improve blood circulation and skin care product absorption rate.
settings.banner12_item1_detail:
Blue Led

Smooth Mode

Purifies and calms skin thanks to its ability to remove bacteria and soothe inflammation. Also helps regulate oil production to treat backne, chestne and assne.
settings.banner12_item2_detail:
Green Led

Glow Mode

Brightens skin tone by regulating melanin overproduction. Also tackles dark marks, stretch marks and broken capillaries. Can also help with wound healing.
settings.banner12_item3_detail:
Red Led

Lift Mode

Helps promote blood circulation and accelerates skin repair, which results in improved skin elasticity. Dimpled skin looks less bumpy, fine lines are softer and skin looks taut.
settings.banner13_title: High-Performance & Instant Relief From First Contact
settings.banner13_desc:
Made with Titanium*, a premium material that is safe, durable and synonymous with usage within the aerospace and biomedical industries.

*Rhodium-coated for strength and corrosion-resistance
settings.banner14_title: Your Customized Body Treatment In the Palm of Your Hand
settings.banner14_desc: The intuitive design feels comfortable in your hand, allowing you to channel your inner esthetician and easily control every mode with the click of a button.
settings.banner15_desc_1:
Recharge your Tri-Light™ Body Sculpt Fit anytime & anywhere with the USB cable.

*Recharging: RED

*Fully Charged: GREEN
settings.banner15_desc_2:
The color of the charging/status LED indicator changes depending on the battery level in the order of

Green → Yellow → Orange → Red.
settings.banner15_item1_detail: GREEN: The battery is fully charged or close to being fully charged.
settings.banner15_item3_detail: ORANGE: The battery is running low.
settings.banner15_item4_detail: RED: The battery needs to be charged.
settings.banner16_title: Triple Temperature Control For Your Safety
settings.banner16_sub_desc_1: Thermistor resistance error is +- 5%, with a temperature error controlled to be less than +- 0.5°C / 32.9°F
settings.banner16_sub_title_2: Automatic Shut Down for Temperature Control
settings.banner16_sub_desc_2: Device shuts down power by Biemetal when temperature exceeds internal standard to prevent various issues with battery, motor & other parts.
settings.banner16_sub_title_3: Automatic Shut Down When Not In Use
settings.banner16_sub_desc_3: Device shuts down power when it is left idle for 3 minutes while the power is on.

settings.faq_answer: This is our way of showing our appreciation. You’ll earn points for activities on our site, like referrals and purchases. You can use them to earn discounts off purchases, so the more you collect the more you save.
Anyone with an account is automatically enrolled.
You can earn points for all sorts of activities, including referring friends, and making purchases. To see all the ways you can earn points click the Earn Points tab in the menu.

settings.faq_question: How do I view my point balance?
settings.faq_answer: Your point balance is on every page in the top bar.

settings.faq_question: How do I redeem my points?
settings.faq_answer: Select the tab called Redeem Points. Here you’ll see all the rewards we offer. If you have enough points, you can redeem them for a reward.

settings.faq_question: Is there a limit to the number of points I can earn?
settings.faq_answer: No. Go ahead and earn as many as you can!

settings.faq_question: What do the 'approved', 'pending' and 'cancelled' statuses mean?
settings.faq_answer: Approved: These points can be redeemed on rewards immediately Pending: These points are need to be verified before you can redeem them. This typically applies to purchases and referrals Cancelled: These points will not be added to your account. For example, this will happen if you cancel a purchase (the points will change from pending to cancelled)

settings.faq_question: What happens if a friend I refer cancels or returns their order?
settings.faq_answer: Your pending points will become cancelled and will be removed from your account.

settings.faq_question: Why did my account balance go down?
settings.faq_answer: You, or someone you referred, cancelled or returned a purchase.

settings.faq_question: I completed an activity but didn't earn points!
settings.faq_answer: It can sometimes take a few minutes for us to process your activity and provide your points.

settings.faq_question: Can I use my points during checkout?
settings.faq_answer: Not directly - please redeem your points for a voucher which can then be applied during checkout.
Yes. Your points will expire after 365 days from the day of acquisition.

settings.faq_question: How do I leave the program?
settings.faq_answer: If you no longer wish to earn points, please contact us and ask to be unenrolled. We'll unenroll you and you will lose any points you have accrued.

settings.faq_question: What happens if I leave and decide to join again?
settings.faq_answer: Just contact us and we'll re-enroll you. However, your point total will begin from zero.

settings.faq_question: Where can I report a problem or give feedback?
settings.faq_answer: Please email to us at support@iloveskininc.com

settings.title: Skin Inc Loyalty Program
settings.banner_text: Be rewarded every time you shop with skin inc along with completing other steps to earn rewards. Sign up now to instantly earn 200 points! For every 100 points you earn you'll get $5 to use towards a purchase.

settings.heading: A New Beginning
settings.icon-text: Skin Inc is well known for combining tech and skincare. Now, we want to make skincare as well as overall good health a lifestyle.

settings.heading: Choose To Put Yourself First
settings.icon-text: Healthy eating, exercise, meditation, and self-care rituals can provide a therapeutic experience to combat stress, anxiety, help calm the mind and make you feel good. Let's do it together, you got this!

settings.heading: Knowing Your Worth
settings.icon-text: You are beautiful and enough in your own way,  be confident and just Embrace it (with us).

settings.banner_text: Wellness is something that many strive to achieve but it is easier said than done. It is a journey that is different for everyone, but know that we're here to Embrace every step of the way with you.

settings.tab_desc: Revive, Glow, Soothe, Optimize & V-Sculpt in just 3 mins, to tackle multiple skin concerns for healthy, glowing skin.

settings.banner4_desc_1: Based on a clinical study after using the Optimizer Voyage Tri-Light™:
settings.banner4_details_1: 95% agrees that skin is clearer with a more refined texture

settings.banner5_details_2: Reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
settings.banner5_details_3: Fade dark spots and even out skin tone
settings.banner6_desc: On space missions, NASA uses LED Light Therapy (a.k.a. chromotherapy) to encourage cells to become healthier and function at a much higher rate. We integrated 5 different LED light wavelengths into one device. Use each setting alone or combine colors to help treat your unique skin!
settings.banner6_red_product_desc: Helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines for a more youthful appearance.
settings.banner6_yellow_product_desc: Helps to revive dull skin for a brighter complexion and reduce the appearance of dark spots.
settings.banner6_blue_product_desc: Helps to tackle acne-causing bacteria and address oily or congested skin.
settings.banner6_orange_product_desc: Combines the benefits of Yellow and Red Lights to help reduce dullness, fine lines, and wrinkles.
settings.banner6_purple_product_desc: Combines the benefits of Red and Blue Lights to help with anti-aging concerns like oxidative stress.

settings.text1: Your skin is your biggest organ and is the barometer of your wellbeing.
settings.text2: It is the first place to show signs of other ailments. Our every thought,  lifestyle and environment greatly affects our greater health and well-being,  impacting us emotionally, mentally, and physically.

settings.heading: INTRODUCING THE WORLD’S FIRST BREAKTHROUGH APP

settings.title: Take a Selfie and get a 360 AI diagnostic & progressive skin report.
settings.content:
Receive personalized coaching from +SABI AI, your new best friend. Get self-care tips and product recommendations based on computer-vision assessment of your lines, pores, moisture, skin tone, and more.

Measure your skin’s hydration level and get precise readings for optimal skin wellness.

settings.title: Customise your 360 wellness journey  for your lit from within glow.

settings.heading:
Step-by-step treatment for transformational results
Glow, Revive, Soothe & V-Sculpt with 5 NASA LED Lights

settings.title: Customize your self-care treatment based on your skin goals.
settings.content: Pair +SABI AI app with Tri-Light™ to enjoy a guided and customised LED facial treatments with your selfie & hydro-sensor analysis. Complete the Skin Identity Quiz to get your clinically-proven and award-winning customised cocktail serum and booster. Leveraging on the data of over 1.2 million skin profiles, your self-care treatment is customised based on water intake, sleep, stress, activity level, menstrual cycle, pollution index, and blue light exposure.

settings.title: Download +SABI AI app, the world’s first 360 wellness skin health coach
Less is more.
settings.content:
You don’t need 20 steps or 20,000
ingredients for a healthy, glowing you.
Generate zero waste with No Nasties
formula customized just for you.
Using SCIENCE to unlock your full potential.
Powered by AI to take the guesswork out of your wellness journey.

Creating the perfect BALANCE
between your emotional, mental,
and physical health.
Nurturing your INNER-BEING cause feeling good is the new looking good.
